files.description: Setup script for the Quran search application. Uses setuptools to configure package details, version, packages, and installation requirements.
List of package requirements for the Quran search application. Currently empty, serving as a placeholder for future dependencies.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Contains functions to read, parse, and return Quran verses as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file and parses each line formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

functions.name: load_quran_data
functions.description: Alias for load_quran_text, providing backward compatibility for loading Quran data.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. It provides functions to search for words and phrases, count occurrences, and calculate gematrical values based on Abjad numeral mapping.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data and returns verses containing the search word, supporting optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform a case-sensitive search; defaults to False for case-insensitive search.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. Checks for an exact phrase with optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform a case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data. The search is performed in a case-insensitive manner by default.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) within a given Surah of the Quran data. Allows optional case-sensitive comparison.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word in the Quran data, handling case-insensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences need to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran data with a case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to count occurrences of.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran data. Considers start and end verses and supports optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Starting verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Ending verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a specific word group within a specified verse range in the Quran data. Supports optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Starting verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Ending verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Search for Quran verses that contain exactly a specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words that a verse must have to be included.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the number of words is a multiple of a specified number. Raises ValueError if the multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple to check against. Must be non-zero.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the gematrical (Abjad) value of an Arabic word or phrase by summing the numeral values of its letters.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: An Arabic word or phrase.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for words in the Quran that have a specified gematrical value. Returns matching words along with their location.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for word groups in the Quran whose gematrical value matches a specified target, with an option for case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value expected.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_surah_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the total gematrical value of all words within a specified Surah by summing each word's value.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number for which to calculate the gematrical value.

functions.name: calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the total gematrical value for all verses within a specified overall verse number range.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: start_verse_num
parameters.description: The starting overall verse number (inclusive).

parameters.name: end_verse_num
parameters.description: The ending overall verse number (inclusive).

functions.name: calculate_quran_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the total gematrical value of the entire Quran by summing the values of each word in all verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data and performs various search operations using functions from the quran_search module, then prints the results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations. It demonstrates functionalities including word search, word group search, verse range queries, word count based searches, and gematrical value calculations, with results printed to the console.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.
Unit tests for the Quran search module. This file contains a comprehensive suite of tests covering various search functions, word count validations, and gematrical value calculations.

classes.name: TestQuranSearch
classes.description: Unit tests for the Quran search functionality covering multiple scenarios of search operations and gematrical calculations.

methods.name: test_search_allah_word
methods.description: Test that searching for the word 'اللَّهِ' returns at least one verse using case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: Instance of TestQuranSearch.

methods.name: test_search_word_group

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: Instance of TestQuranSearch.

files.description: Data file containing Quran text in Uthmani script. Each line is formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.
